name: easybuild

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
EasyBuild is a software build and installation framework for
(scientific) software on HPC systems.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-easybuild-framework
dependencies.description:
The core of EasyBuild, a software build and installation framework for
(scientific) software on HPC systems.

dependencies.name: py-easybuild-easyblocks
dependencies.description:
Collection of easyblocks for EasyBuild, a software build and
installation framework for (scientific) software on HPC systems.

dependencies.name: py-easybuild-easyconfigs
dependencies.description:
Collection of easyconfig files for EasyBuild, a software build and
installation framework for (scientific) software on HPC systems.
